website_summaries.verdict: A quality set of neoprene dumbbells that are ideal if you don't want something in bright colors.
pros: Includes 3-pound, 5-pound, and 8-pound weights and a stand
The hexagonal shape prevents them from rolling and the weights are also all black in color
Long lasting and comfortable to hold
cons: The plastic stand isn't very sturdy

customer_reviews.title: wrong color...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the all black color weights and what I get are the pastel colored set that I would never buy. I am a protective supervision caregiver for my grandmother and I do not have the free time to bring these weights to the UPS store to get a refund, so I will just remain unsatisfied with this transaction since the set is still the correct weight numbers at least for me to do my excersize. I just want this to be known so others can not hold high hopes on getting exactly what they ordered, but I will say the weight numbers are good, and they still work as they should, just not at all as described in color.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with this weight set. I can’t stand that light weights are always candy colored and en eyesore in common spaces, so these all black units are handsome. I took one star off because the stand is a little wobbly as if the base isn’t level, but it’s plenty strong to hold the weights up (for now). I recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: KLF

customer_reviews.title: Required hardware for stand is missing!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously arrived with NO HARDWARE (screws) to assemble the stand, but obviously requires them!!! Very frustrating because I read this in the reviews that people were missing screws and I thought, “Oh surely that won’t happen to me.” And YES it did. The little rack is pretty crappy quality to begin with, but the fact that it’s missing screws makes it basically worthless (unless I just wanna run out to Home Depot to grab some). Weight quality is whatever. Nothing spectacular, but I like that they are black. I could’ve seriously gone to Walmart and gotten colored weights for less money. Pretty livid that the screws are missing. Grrrrrr!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Geier

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Packaged arrived on time. When you open package, be sure to locate the pins that are used to assemble rack and the smaller items used to fasten everything. I am satisfied with this purchase. If you want light dumbells made like the heavy ones and in a place to store neatly in a compact way, this is the way. Resistence bands and light weights provides a productive avenue to strenght training for anyone especially those with rotor cuff, bursitis, or impingement issues. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for price but check hardware before assembling stand!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how quickly these came. The barbells are super nice and the quality is excellent! I can’t say the same about the stand. It’s made of a very cheap plastic. One of the screws didn’t have cut outs on the head so I couldn’t use it to assemble completely. On top of that, the stand is black and the screws are silver. I really wanted to give 4 stars but couldn’t bring myself to it because of the stand!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Delguidice

customer_reviews.title: With a good screwdriver, it's not too hard to put the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. With a good screwdriver, it's not too hard to put the stand together. The stand is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: bluejeanf

customer_reviews.title: Cute set to have for light lifting days
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute set to have for light weight lifting the quality is pretty good --the rack is made of plastic --keeps it organized -so far its pretty sturdy --but i should have purchased the more heavier set -but this set is good to have
customer_reviews.author: mmmpala

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I had rotatory cuff sorcery and the physical therapist recommended using light weights in the recovery phase. I bought this set and it has served me well daily in the recovery.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The screws for the stand are too large
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers have said, I bought this set because it came with a stand. I read complaints that the stand was flimsy and hard to assemble but I figured my husband could take care of it. He almost ruined a screwdriver on it before switching to a power drill. He says the screws are too large to cut into the plastic dowels the way they need to, and that's why the stand is so rickety. I would have bought something else if I'd known. BTW the weights are fine.
customer_reviews.author: myprofilename

customer_reviews.title: Weight holder is worthless.
customer_reviews.text: The weights are as expected. But the holder was the main reason I bought this set. The holder is literally the thinnest plastic and it doesn’t stay together, period. I had even tried hot glueing it to reinforce the thin little plastic pieces they use to connect the front and back. Needless to say it instantly tipped back over and broke. You may buy it for the weights but the holder is instant garbage.
customer_reviews.author: TMcIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Purple stand?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set specifically because it was all black. When it came in the mail the stand was purple and the bottom left screw was missing. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Laxdal4

customer_reviews.title: like its melted on
customer_reviews.text: Styrofoam was all stuck on dumbbells, like its melted on. other than the foam melted on the dumbbells which I cant easily get off, they work great. The standing mold is made of plastic but a lot sturdier than expected when put together, Don't kno how I would feel just leaving the top one in without the other two, but other good pair of dumbbells..
customer_reviews.author: skyylab

customer_reviews.title: Good for Rehab and Core Strength
customer_reviews.text: Hey these are just what they seem to be. Nice little hand weights for rehab and core strength work. Like working on your rotator cuff rehab. Clean, come with a little plastic stand, hexagonal shape ensures they don't roll around. Obviously these hand weights are too light for snatch and press work, but you can integrate the smaller sizes into lots of other core work and upper body tuning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition. My nephews needed this addition to their home gym and it is working out nicely. Having the rack is nice to keep them organized and off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Gourdin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! Not too pricey, and the weight range is what I need for toning up but not putting on too much muscle. I'm very pleased with the stand it came with, it looked a little rickety at first, but once you screw the pieces together, it holds nicely and sturdily. I like how compact it is and how I can put it almost anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Zoë Z~

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: The weights are strong and the rack is a bit small but it's sturdy. we are pleased with the purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: So yes the stand is flimsy, but if you use some epoxy and longer screws it goes together easily and is now rock solid. I love that the ends are not round and so don't roll.
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: Dumbbell set with Rack
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to receive this product. I was able to use it during the sheltering time while doing virtual workouts. It is compact and the weights are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Dauer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware you won't get cap weights you'll get tone multicolor instead
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed I ordered cap and instead I got tone multicolor if cap was out of stock I was willing to wait I will keep them but I'm not happy buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: cmt1

customer_reviews.title: Great Barbells Set
customer_reviews.text: I needed a nice set of barbells and these are very helpful. I plan to start with the three pounds and work my way up. They were package nicely and they are definitely very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pure

customer_reviews.title: Believe the other reviews!
customer_reviews.text: These weights are excellent quality. Well constructed, good finish. Yes, the stand is plastic and we'll see how long it lasts - but so far it is holding the weights and is very stable. The set came complete and was not missing anything. I am very satisfied with this purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: RosyRJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice weights, cheap rack
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic rack designed to hold heavy weights. Guaranteed to not last long. As for the price. I see some people are upset because they paid over $200 bucks for the set. I only paid $109 plus tax because of the vendor I bought them from wasn't price gouging.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Dirty and torn
customer_reviews.text: The weights are reasonably priced, but they appear to be used. They arrived extremely dirty - covered in dust and a white coating that appears to be something like paper towel residue. More problematically, two of the weights have torn neoprene, exposing the metal beneath.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Website description inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: They’re not black! Mine arrived with a purple rack, and three different colors of neon weights. On top of that, the screws are very prominent and make the rack look very cheap. We live kind of far from the post office and we both work, so 32lbs of weights are not going to be returned. Very disappointing experience.
customer_reviews.author: sort of handy

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packaged came damaged ...
customer_reviews.text: The weights are fine but the cheep plastic stand came cracked. No surprise banging around loose in the box with the dumbbells. Sent a message to get the stand replaced, will revise review if I receive replacement, otherwise poor quality overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Great price Great set of barbells
customer_reviews.text: These barbells are perfect. Perfect for different work outs. Good quality and easy to use. The price was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: The dumbells are great, however
customer_reviews.text: The dumbells are great, however, the rack they come with is terrible and doesn't stay together. Super flimsy and cheap. I threw it away, and now just keep the dumbells lined up on the side of my gym floor.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality weights. We bought for our peloton and the 3 and 5 lbs weights fit great. The 8 lbs ones are a bit to big to fit but are still good.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUY
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to get larger weights and the coating is really nice it's a nice set
customer_reviews.author: Alim R.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Used for therapy after shoulder surgery. Great for light workouts
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rosemond

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Weights will work perfectly the stand is a little cheap but it will work just fine!
customer_reviews.author: LBenigs

customer_reviews.title: A great little set
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I practice boxing with these and I alternate between them. They have a nice serious black look to em and handle very well in the hands. The rack is ok it gets the job done but hey I'm more worried about the dumbells
customer_reviews.author: Jolon

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the weights
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to put the stand together, so I didn’t in the end, but the weights are great.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: quality at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses these for some light weight resistance. They have a great grip to them. Slight smell at first but goes away after a few days. Easy to put the stand together. seems like a quality product at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Raj D

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of weights
customer_reviews.text: This set of weights is perfect. Just the sizes I needed and I like the rack so the are put way neatly. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Bent stand, weights are great though
customer_reviews.text: Stand arrived bent, but serves its purpose. Little wobbly but it works. Weights themselves are great.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend's grandson was so excited to get these. He likes working out with me in our gym. I'm glad I can help him at an early age, with being a certified fitness trainer.
customer_reviews.author: pita95

customer_reviews.title: Pre Teen
customer_reviews.text: Just what the pre-teen wanted to incorporate into his exercise routine.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Weights are fantastic but the stand is a cheap plastic that needs ...
customer_reviews.text: Weights are fantastic but the stand is a cheap plastic that needs to be assembled. Seems like a nice wooden stand wouldn't be asking too much and I'd be willing to pay extra.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic starter set of weights. The material is durable, as one would expect. The grips are non-slip, even for small hands. Wish the stand were a little sturdier, but overall, a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Pam S

customer_reviews.title: Sent me a wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Advertized all black but received the item multicolored. The stand is made of plastic, doesn't feel sturdy. Now I have to return, which is a huge hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Bijoubear

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Fitness
customer_reviews.text: For the price a nice little add on to our home gym. Stand is plastic but built well enough to handle the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of weights
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of weights. Hurt my shoulder so I needed a small set for PT. They have a good grip and I like the stand, keeps them all together so I'm not searching the house for them.
customer_reviews.author: Zolu

customer_reviews.title: The holder is pretty cheap, but it works
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for. The holder is pretty cheap, but it works. The weights seem to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Nice, simple set
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple set of hand weights, I mainly use 'em for shadowboxing and a few other fight workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Holland

customer_reviews.title: Workout dumbells
customer_reviews.text: Received it pretty late but it came & nothing is damaged an all the pieces are there
customer_reviews.author: Johany

customer_reviews.title: My thought of my new dumbells
customer_reviews.text: I've began my workouts at home so I've ordered these bum bells. They have a nice grip. The stand is nice and sturdy. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Toosmooth131

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I wanted and needed great quality fast service
customer_reviews.author: Shellie Burden

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Dumbbells are great. Very comfortable. The stand is cheap plastic. It works and is what I expected for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, A Little Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Good Product, A Little Pricey! Purchased these for my wife and they appear to be as advertised though I do think they are a little pricey!
customer_reviews.author: J. O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: The weights are great. however
customer_reviews.text: The weights are great. however, the holder is poorly made. It's made out of cheap plastic. Over all I think this is a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Koala

customer_reviews.title: ... rubber is kind of sticky and the stand feels like cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: The rubber is kind of sticky and the stand feels like cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Item is as expected. Decent price for what you ...
customer_reviews.text: Item is as expected. Decent price for what you get. The stand is a bit flimsy, but that's what I'd expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ARF

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Basic Dumbbell set for our home gym. The stand isn't great but it works. Overall great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ev

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great to have on hand to do small exercise routines.
customer_reviews.author: Kristan

customer_reviews.title: The weights were great... The stand was little bit difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: The weights were great... The stand was little bit difficult to screw together and very flimsy. But all in all satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dumb bells are perfect
customer_reviews.text: Dumb bells are perfect... Item was delivered when I was told. . .A little disappointed in the stand that came with the set ,plastic and it doesn't hold or stay together.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Renee Henry

customer_reviews.title: Good set of 3 different weights
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set. Just whish the 3 weights would have been different colors instead of all black.
customer_reviews.author: Apache64a

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and really nice weights. Good product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: ... right but the holder is cheep but still a good
customer_reviews.text: weights seem right but the holder is cheep but still a good deal
customer_reviews.author: J. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Overall worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The stand is flimsy but overall looks good and weights are worth the price. Hard to find in all black.
customer_reviews.author: Edward R.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Check the accuracy of weight and they smelled like chemicals for days
customer_reviews.author: John W. Picard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent weights for the family
customer_reviews.text: Nice weights and well priced. The stand is a good way to store them.
customer_reviews.author: Spiceguy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good weights. Simple and gets the job done. The stand is plastic but it works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth0129

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: they look great and as pictured. they are a fantastic addition to our home gym
customer_reviews.author: Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great price. rack works but very light so will tip easy.
customer_reviews.author: ashoe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome weights!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for light working out at home. They work great and I have had no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The rack is made of plastic, not sure how it will hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Chucez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Like the grip texture which helps make them non slip when sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Drago Frey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Threw away the light, cheap plastic stand. Solid black and have a comfortable grip.
customer_reviews.author: Tamaratew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality weights good grip I just wish they went higher than 15 pounds
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT! Arrived before the estimated date. And the product was in good shape and I can not wait to use them in my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the weight stand is light plastic and isn't the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. The weight rack is cheap plastic, but it does the job. As expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Luke McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Stand is poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Dumbbells are fine, but the stand is super cheap and poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Bakker

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The weights are fine but the stand will not stay together. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! It's a great starting set! I loved grip-able coating of the dumbbells.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal on weights. Stand is trash.
customer_reviews.text: The weights themselves are a good deal- I happened to see hex weights covered in neoprene at target on sale the other day... To buy the same set would've been slightly cheaper at target, but in bright colors. I figured my husband would prefer black in case he ever wants to use them. The plastic stand is cheap and arrived missing pieces needed to assemble it. I didn't bother returning it because I really just wanted the weights. Will probably throw out stand.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Smelly and oily
customer_reviews.text: These smelled so strongly of chemicals when they arrived, I had to leave them outside for several days before I could tolerate to have them in the house. Even now, they still have an oily residue on them.
customer_reviews.author: Markelle

customer_reviews.title: Would Reccomend and Purchase Again
customer_reviews.text: I'm an Amazon Seller. I know Feedback is important but I will be honest. Arrived in good order, easy assembly of rack and weights are good quality. It had a strong odor but the odor is slowly dissipating. Would recommend and purchase again. Only 4 not 5 stars because it arrived a day late. Clearly the fault of USPS but still not a 5 star experience. Update 3/10/17 - The odor that I referred to previously has completely dissipated and the weights no longer have any odor.
customer_reviews.author: JD2

customer_reviews.title: 2-pound, 3-pound, & 5-pound set (6 weights total) - very happy & satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great starter pack of dumbbells! I ordered this set, but I was shipped a set of two 2-pound, 3-pound, and 5-pound weights. There was no 8-pound set of weights in my set. As it turns out, I'm glad!!! 8 pounds would've killed me, doing reps w/ my workout video. Lol. It came with a flimsy but (barely) functional stand. Maybe I'll glue the stand together so it stops falling apart. Overall, for the price ($27) this was WELL WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin H

customer_reviews.title: Stand was easy to put together and has been sturdy through the ...
customer_reviews.text: I no problems here! Stand was easy to put together and has been sturdy through the 4 weeks I've used it. I like the shape and the grip of the weights. Looking to increase my wieghts with on ones like them now that I've out grown these...
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality weights
customer_reviews.text: They get the job done for shadow boxing with weights. Also, my wife can't handle much heavier weights for curls and presses. Good quality weights. The rack is a little cheap plastic job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The stand is flimsy and could be better. Otherwise these weights are exactly what we expected
customer_reviews.text: The stand is flimsy and could be better. Otherwise these weights are exactly what we expected.
customer_reviews.author: E. Yeager

customer_reviews.title: cheap plastic holder but does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: tree that holds weights is cheap plastic but will suffice. looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Blair C Pietrini

customer_reviews.title: Great buy1
customer_reviews.text: I use these every day and they feel good, work good, and look good!
customer_reviews.author: Rough Draft Book Blog

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the weights are great but the stand is a little flimsy
customer_reviews.author: moltenmaven

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I purposely purchased this set because they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. Very disappointed. I purposely purchased this set because they are listed as BLACK. I received a colored set, orange, yellowish, and purple. If I had wanted the colored weights, I would have bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Hex Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Beware of incorrect photo
customer_reviews.text: The weights seem fine. My issue is that the photo features a set of 2,3, and 5 lb weights, and so that was what I expected. Instead I received a set of 3,5, and 8 pound wights. As it turns out, they have the incorrect photo! When the webpage loads, there is a choice of weight sets - 20 or 32 lbs, but the default choice is the 32 lbs, and the photo featured is the 20lb set. In short, I was mislead by the picture. I saw the 20lb set, and ordered accordingly. Please make sure you are aware of which set you are choosing as the photo is the same for both sets!
customer_reviews.author: Bronzeman1234

customer_reviews.title: Weights don’t roll
customer_reviews.text: Really great weights that are comfortable to use. Stand is a bit cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Silverbelle

product_meta.title: CAP Barbell Neoprene Dumbbell Set with Rack
feature_bullets: VERSATILE WORKOUTS – The durable, neoprene material covering these dumbbells is great for indoor and outdoor workouts; Use to target individual muscle groups or get a full body workout
WHAT’S INCLUDED – A convenient dumbbell storage rack with 3 pairs of dumbbells in 3 pounds, 5 pounds and 8 pounds
ANTI ROLL DESIGN – The hexagonal shape of the dumbbell heads prevents them from rolling when not in use
PERFECT FOR TRAVEL – This set is compact and perfect for traveling; don't let your workouts stop at home

TONE & STRENGTHEN – Dumbbells are an essential addition to any strength training routine; Build muscle, improve core strength, boost balance, burn more calories, increase energy levels and more by using dumbbells in your fitness routine
